Return function to interpolate a RUB color palette

Source: R/rub_colors.R
get_RUB_palettes.Rd

Return function to interpolate a RUB color palette

get_RUB_palettes(palette = "discrete", reverse = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

palette

Character name of palette in RUB_palettes
reverse

Optional boolean indicating whether the palette should be reversed, defaults to FALSE.
...

Additional arguments to pass to colorRamp

Value

Color palette

Examples

get_RUB_palettes(palette = "continuous")
#> function (n) 
#> {
#>     x <- ramp(seq.int(0, 1, length.out = n))
#>     if (ncol(x) == 4L) 
#>         rgb(x[, 1L], x[, 2L], x[, 3L], x[, 4L], maxColorValue = 255)
#>     else rgb(x[, 1L], x[, 2L], x[, 3L], maxColorValue = 255)
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x0000000012eade80>
#> <environment: 0x0000000012eab198>
